GSD.product_version: versions from v3.16 to before v5.15.33
GSD.description:
ALSA: firewire-lib: fix uninitialized flag for AV/C deferred transaction

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.33 by commit eab74c41612083bd627b60da650e19234e4f1051, it was introduced in version v3.16 by commit 00a7bb81c20f3e81711e28e0f6c08cee8fd18514. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ALSA: firewire-lib: fix uninitialized flag for AV/C deferred transaction
